pages.text:
[Page Title: Uptown Social | Bar in Charleston, SC]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating hero video paused, press to play video Playing hero video, press to pause video 
Welcome to Uptown Social

A cornerstone of Charleston’s vibrant King Street scene and the flagship concept of the Uptown Hospitality Group. Since opening in 2018, we’ve been redefining the entertainment experience for both locals and visitors alike. Whether you’re snapping a photo in front of our iconic “Social Butterfly” mural, savoring a Thin & Crispy pizza from Brooklyn Legend, Anthony Falco, or enjoying live music from local bands and world-famous DJs, Uptown Social checks all the boxes for a great time.

Menu

elevated pub fare meets the perfect slice of Brooklyn! Our menu superstar is the bar pie—a mouthwatering creation by legendary pizza maker Anthony Falco. These signature 12" pies are crafted to perfection, bringing a taste of Brooklyn to every bite.
View Menus 
Join our Team

We work hard & play hard!
Apply 
Private Events

Our private rooms and shareable menu make us the perfect setting for your next event.
Book An Event 
Entertainment

Live music every night of the week!
View lineup 
Our mission is simple:

Create a space where everyone feels welcome, and every experience is unforgettable.

Private Events
Slide 1 of 4 Slide 2 of 4 Slide 3 of 4 Slide 4 of 4 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Book an Event

Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! We offer an exquisite setting for all your special occasions. Whether you're planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or an intimate social event, our versatile spaces and exceptional service will make your event unforgettable.

For all inquiries, please fill out the form below and we’ll be in touch soon.
